body.name: ZERDER Wooden Dresser for Bedroom with 3 Drawers, Chest Organizer for Living Room, Bedroom, Entryway or Office, Closet Organizer with Wooden Legs, Nightstand Bedside Table Furniture, White
features: 【Modern Design and Multifunctional Dresser】: ZERDER wooden bedroom dresser with 3 drawers is very suitable for various occasions and multifunctional, such as bedroom, living room, hallway, dorm and office. It can be used not only as a dress closet organizer, underwear dresser, but also as an accent chest drawer in the living room.

【Stable & Durable Premium Material】: Made of P2 Grade Board, more cost-effective and environmentally sustainable. The superior panel not only increases durability, but also can resist water and scratches. Our dresser features premium metal slides that glide smoothly and are built to last. The smooth surface is easy to clean without any smell. The elevated feet prevents the dresser from moisture damage, and protect the ground. And easily to clean the ground under the dresser.

【Space Saving and Anti-Falling】: With 3 spacious drawers measuring 20.7” L x 13” W x 4.7” H, our dresser is perfect for storing adorable clothes, blankets and more. Anti-falling accessory included will prevent injury from unexpected tipping of furniture. The back of the drawer dresser is also equipped with a stabilizing device, which makes the dresser more stable and durable.

【Easy Assembly】: It is easy to assemble with detailed instruction and tools in the package, every parts and accessories are numbered. Please feel free to contact us via support email if you have any question. ZERDER wood dresser does not take up much space. Perfect gift for a housewarming or your family and friends.

【What's in the package】: A bedroom dresser with 3 drawers furniture from ZERDER, included user manual, the necessary tools and hardware. We care much about your shopping experience! Whatever product details, installation difficulty, or quality issues, just contact us !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect secondary dresser for much-needed extra storage!
reviews.reviewText: I am so incredibly happy with my new dresser! Previously, I was struggling to find enough storage space for my clothing collection, so this dresser has been a lifesaver. While it may not be large enough to be my main dresser, it is perfect for providing that extra storage space that I require.The assembly process was not too difficult, although it did take a bit of time. I wanted to make sure that everything was done just right, so I read through the instruction guide carefully before starting. This helped me to anticipate any potential issues and avoid any mistakes. While the guide may seem daunting at first, it is definitely worthwhile to take the time to read through it thoroughly.One of my favorite things about this dresser is the spacious drawers. They are much roomier than I expected, which is fantastic for storing all of my clothes. Additionally, they slide in and out with ease, which makes it very convenient for me to access my clothing quickly and efficiently. The dresser also feels very sturdy and high-quality, which is surprising given its affordable price point.While I personally wouldn't use this dresser as my main dresser, it would be perfect for a child's room or as extra storage space in any bedroom. The simplistic design is also a major plus, as it allows the dresser to blend in seamlessly with any decor. I plan on adding a unique touch to the front drawer panels with a really cool peel-and-stick wallpaper that I also purchased from Amazon. I think this should give the dresser a more personalized feel and hopefully make it stand out even more.Overall, I am beyond thrilled with this dresser and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for extra storage space. It is definitely a worthwhile investment that has made my life so much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to build.
reviews.reviewText: This is really more of a night stand, or tiny dresser. It’s very attractive and. East to put together. The drawers are smooth and close easily except if you stuff them which is easy to do because it’s a small unit and the height between drawers is limited. This would be great for underwear, t. Shirts , kids clothes, or paper and other Knick knacks. Definitely not for jeans or sweaters.This would actually just make more sense in a home office, actually perfect for a home office..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy, attractive, great quality and smooth assembly!
reviews.reviewText: Once assembled, the outcome is a beauty!This has lots of pieces, but assembly went very smoothly. I was finished in about 30 minutes.The parts came well packed and well labeled. The instructions were clear and straightforward.I am using this as a night table in my guest bedroom, and the size is perfect! This is in no way a small night stand. Guests will heave lots of space to store their things.The finished product is a heavy weight piece of furniture. The box weighed a ton, so I had to remove the pieces from the box to get it into the bedroom for assembly.The main parts of this night stand are made of wood. The drawer hardware is made of white coated metal. I was happy that each piece of drawer hardware had an identifying label impressed right into the metal. This made it easy to identify what’s what when installing. (DR, DL etc.)The drawers are so roomy and they slide very smoothly. When inserting the drawers, make sure the drawer rollers are placed properly when you slide them in. The hand grips to open and close the drawers are well done and the opening is the perfect size.The finish on this piece is flawless. It’s a white matte finish which I love. I have cleaned it and all went well. The finish seems very durable.When this was delivered, the proof of delivery photo showed someone else’s door. My heart sank because I really wanted this, but I was determined to find out where it ended up. I’m so happy that I tracked down the mis-delivered package. I’m over the moon happy with this quality piece and I’m happy to have it!I highly recommend this! A quality piece at a fair price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble, Sleek Design
reviews.reviewText: This small dresser was ordered to be a nightstand for my daughter, and she is the one who unpacked and assembled it. The dresser parts arrived well packaged in foam and each piece was labeled with a number or letter, making assembly convenient and easy. My daughter does not have a lot of experience assembling furniture or using power tools, but found it to be intuitive to put together. The directions were easy to follow and only required use of a hand drill and screwdriver for assembly. My daughter had it all put together in an hour, and was pleased with her solid piece of bedroom furniture for her apartment. This dresser is the perfect size for a nightstand. Would recommend this especially for use in a dorm or apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars WOW, lots of screws!
reviews.reviewText: The assembly was timely and somewhat complicated with soooooo many screws (at least 150) and you can’t even use an electric screwdriver. The directions were fairly confusing at times and unless you have 2-3 hours to devote to assembly then don't bother. The end product is attractive and sturdy (use mine as a larger than usual nightstand) and is most definitely a great storage option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely sized dresser, pain to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes I think to myself, "I'm a an alpha male I can assemble "Blank" without reading the instructions". This was not one of those instances, as I read the instructions from the beginning and it was still painful. First the good...Good: Attractive design. Very stable, solid wood construction (metal gliders and decent wood, not glorified balsa wood like some Ikea furniture). Nice size, with a fair amount of room in each drawer. Only a screwdriver needed for assembly and it comes with extra screws, just in case.Bad: To get from the before to the after picture took me almost 2 hours. The instruction packet recommends 2 people, but I didn't feel like pestering a friend. The instructions are easy enough to understand but assembling everything without a power drill (as it recommends) is very time consuming. If I have to assemble furniture, I prefer for it to be in the "30 minutes or less" category.It's a very nice dresser and I recommend it, but would give it 4.5 stars due to the time factor. Just remember it will go quicker if you have a friend.
